value: If you the have SuperSU App installed or can install it, do so
From Settings Tab of SuperSU,  scroll down and select Full Unroot

If you do not want to use SuperSU, you will have to manually delete files and application related to root using a File Manager application. For further instructions - https://www.androidauthority.com/how-to-unroot-android-phone-tablet-652905/

description: You are missing  protection against Viruses and Malware

value: Go to Google Play Store. (Click “Go To...” below)
Search for anti virus applications (AVG AntiVirus Free, McAfee, Trend Micro, Symantec and other reputable Security companies offer free versions of their apps)
Select the App that has high (4.0 or more) user ratings and offers features that seem appropriate for your need and Install it.
Go to Settings->Apps->Default Apps. (Click “Go To...” below)
Select specific Browser Apps (e.g. Chrome)
Click Set as Default Option
Go to Google Play Store. (Click “Go To...” below)
Search for Firewall Applications(NoRoot Firewall, NetGuard - no-root firewall is one of the highly used free apps)
Select the App that has high (4.0 or more) user ratings and offers features that seem appropriate for your need and Install it.
Go to Settings -> Biometrics  Security (OR Security  location OR simply)-> Screen Lock. (Click “Go To...” below)
Turn Screen Lock ON
If there is a password option, select that instead of Screen Lock for better security. Make password at least 10 characters long with a combination of upper/lower case and numbers
Open Google Play Store App. (Click “Go To...” below)
Search for Anti-Phishing Applications (AVG AntiVirus Free – Android Virus Cleaner 2020, Mobile Security: Antivirus, Wi-Fi VPN  Anti-Theft, JioSecurity: Malware Scan, Antivirus, App Lock)
Open Google Play Store App. (Click “Go To...” below)
Search for VPN Application
Select a free or paid app with at least a 4.0 rating and which has the features suitable to your need
Go to setting -> Apps (or Privacy and then Permission Manager) -> Select Camera App . (Click “Go To...” below)
Select Location, then Select Deny
Go to setting -> Apps (or Privacy and then Permission Manager).(Click “Go To...” below)
Select Social Media Apps
Select Location, then Select Deny (or Only while using App)
Go to your antivirus app
Enable web-download scanning for Virus files
Click “Block” on pop-ups that warm about harmful (or Virus) files
Go to Settings->WiFi. (Click “Go To...” below)
Select network which you want to turn Poxy ON, then select Modify Network and click on Advance Options
Select Manual or Auto based on available proxy setting and configure parameters provided by your network provider
Search for USB debugging option
Disable it
Login to your Wifi router
Go to the Firewall Settings page
If there is a setting for Block All Inbound Access turn it ON
Login to your WiFi router
Go to the Administrator account page
Change the WiFi routers administrative password to make it at least 10 characters long with a combination of upper/lower case letters and numbers
To turn VPN on while using 3rd party WiFi, go to VPN manager from WhiteHaX CyberSafe app menu
Slide VPN switch to ON
Go to Settings App->Network Settings ->VPN
Turn IPSec VPN to increase privacy and security of your Internet communication
Login to your Wifi router
Go to the WiFi Settings page
Change the WiFi router settings to hide SSID. This will help reduce potential WiFI intrusions
Login to your Wifi router
Go to the WiFi Settings page
In the WiFi Settings, choose either WPA2 or WPA2-PSK for stronger WiFi data Encryption between your devices and the router
Login to your WiFi router
Go to the WiFi Network Settings Page
Change the WiFi router IP Address by changing 3rd, (2 or) 3 digit number. This will reduce potential WiFi security breaches
Login to your WiFi router
Go to the WiFi Router Settings  page
Set the DNS Server settings to Auto-select. If 2 DNS server IPs are visible, check to ensure they are your ISPs DNS servers (you may have to call your ISP to verify)
Login to your WiFi router
Go to the WiFi Network Settings Page
Change the WiFi router IP Address by changing 3rd, (2 or) 3 digit number.
Next, Go to the Administrator account page
Change the WiFi routers administrative password to make it at least 10 characters long with a combination of upper/lower case letters and numbers
Next, Go to Settings App->Network Settings ->VPN
Turn IPSec VPN to increase privacy and security of your Internet communication
Turn off the NFC
description: Checks whether the NFC module is enabled on your phone.

value: Turn off the Bluetooth
description: Checks whether the Bluetooth module is enabled on your phone.
Enabling storage encryption helps protect against Data theft.
Utiliser un navigateur qui offre une protection solide de la vie privée et des données.

You are missing VPN for enhanced privacy and security while browsing Admin User access can cause many types of data and security breach
Turn off Location Sharing when using Camera to protect privacy
A Web Proxy can increase privacy and filter bad web data content before it gets downloaded on to your device.
USB Debugging allows you to make changes to your device from a computer. It is best to leave this setting switched off.

An ad platform hidden in some of these game's code lets the company target advertisements to its users. That meant sensitive data like phone numbers, call logs, location, political information and even information about users' sexual orientation could be public and available to government agencies and advertisers.

This test checks whether Google Play Protect is enabled on Play Store or not.
remediationSteps: Open the Google Play Store app Google Play.
At the top right, tap the profile icon.
Tap Play Protect and then Settings Settings.
Turn Scan apps with Play Protect on
